server.name: io.github.k8ika0s/mcp-tmux
server.description: Model Context Protocol server that lets LLMs collaboratively drive tmux

environmentVariables.description: Optional default SSH host alias to use when none is provided.
environmentVariables.name: MCP_TMUX_HOST

environmentVariables.description: Optional default tmux session name to use when none is provided.
environmentVariables.name: MCP_TMUX_SESSION

environmentVariables.description: Optional path to tmux binary if not on PATH.
environmentVariables.name: TMUX_BIN

environmentVariables.description: Timeout in milliseconds for tmux/ssh invocations (default 15000).
environmentVariables.name: MCP_TMUX_TIMEOUT_MS

environmentVariables.description: Optional JSON file for per-host tmux PATH/bin overrides.
environmentVariables.name: MCP_TMUX_HOSTS_FILE
